faq.title: Questions?
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions here

q1.question: How often should a heat pump be serviced?
q1.answer: We recommend annual maintenance to ensure optimal efficiency and lifespan of your heat pump.

q2.question: What is included in the maintenance service?
q2.answer: Our maintenance includes checking all components, cleaning, refrigerant control, software updates and a digital protocol.

q3.question: Which brands are supported?
q3.answer: We are certified for all leading brands: Viessmann, Bosch, Vaillant, Daikin, Mitsubishi, Panasonic, Stiebel Eltron and more.

q4.question: What happens in case of a defect?
q4.answer: With the Standard or Premium package, repairs are covered. We take care of the fix quickly and easily.

q5.question: Can I reschedule the appointment?
q5.answer: Yes, you can reschedule appointments free of charge up to 48 hours in advance via your customer portal or by phone.
